bibl.title: Letter from Leonard and Louise Schellberg to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 17, 1940

div1.p: The Schellbergs send their love and enclose a first day issue cancellation of the Walter Reed five cent stamp.

div1.head: Letter from Leonard and Louise Schellberg to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 17, 1940
div1.p:
Our thoughts
are so often with you
and we plan to visit
you before long but
in the meantime we send
your best love in this
special envelope with these
new and beautiful com-
memerative stamps out for
the first time in this city only
div1.closer:
Yours sincerely Leonard and Louise Schellberg
